sysevent_email_template.message_html:
<p>Dear ${requested_by},</p>
<p>Your ticket with the number <strong>${number}</strong> has been updated.</p>
<p><strong>Ticket Summary:</strong> ${ticket_summary}</p>
<p><strong>Ticket Details:</strong> ${ticket_details}</p>
<p>The current status of the ticket is: <strong>${state}</strong>.</p>

<p>If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to respond to this email.</p>
<p>Thank you,</p>
<p><strong>${assigned_to}</strong><br>
Ticket Resolver<br>
${assignment_group}</p>
sysevent_email_template.name: HRM Ticket Template
sysevent_email_template.subject: Ticket [${number}] - Update from Resolver
